tossup_question: -   –  A neutron, an electron, a proton, and an alpha particle are all traveling at the same speed. Which of these particles has the shortest de Broglie wavelength?
bonus_question:
-   –   Identify all of the following 3 statements that are true of equipotential surfaces:
Field lines and equipotential surfaces are always mutually perpendicular; 2) When all charges are at rest, the surface of a conductor is always an equipotential surface; 3) The work done to move a charge from any point on an equipotential surface to any other point on the equipotential surface is zero.
